code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Sidebar=_ref=>{let{selectedAddress,data,onToggleNode,addedNodes}=_ref;const[activeTab,setActiveTab]=useState("inflow");if(!selectedAddress||!data)return null;const renderList=(items,type)=>items.map((item,index)=>{const isAdded=addedNodes.includes(item.address);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"tx-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"tx-details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"tx-address",children:item.address}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"tx-meta"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onToggleNode(item.address,type),className:isAdded?"active":"",children:isAdded?"−":"+"})]},`${type}-${index}`);});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"sidebar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"tabs",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`tab ${activeTab==="inflow"?"active-tab":""}`,onClick:()=>setActiveTab("inflow"),children:"INFLOWS"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`tab ${activeTab==="outflow"?"active-tab":""}`,onClick:()=>setActiveTab("outflow"),children:"OUTFLOWS"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"tab-content",children:activeTab==="inflow"?renderList(data.inflows,"inflow"):renderList(data.outflows,"outflow")})]});};export default Sidebar;
